title: Unfair Low Priority Queue
body: So, today I tried to play a game and as soon as champ select was over, my client crashed and I couldn't load in. I tried restarting my client and when I tried to repair my client it said "An unknown error occurred." So I decided to reinstall League and when I finally get back onto the client, I have a Low Priority Queue for something I had **NO** control over. Is there a way you could possibly lower the amount of games I have this for or remove it entirely? Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Unfortunately there is no way to remove leaverbuster penalties from your account, the system is designed in such a way to prevent corruption.

It is up to you to ensure your client is fully functional before entering a game, if this means launching up a custom game before you want to play then so be it.

For more information on the leaverbuster system please see the [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).

>**I CRASHED AND GOT A LEAVE/MMR LOSS. CAN I GET THOSE REMOVED FROM MY ACCOUNT?**
Our system does not allow the removal of leaves or the modification of MMR. It was designed in this manner in order to prevent corruption.

>**IT'S NOT MY FAULT. MY INTERNET/YOUR SERVERS DISCONNECTED ME. I HAD A REAL-LIFE EMERGENCY. I HAD TO GET OFF THE COMPUTER. THE GAME CRASHED. UNBAN ME!**
We understand that players may be forced to leave from time to time so the system has been designed to keep these situations in mind. After leaving a few games, you will be placed into a low priority queue; as long as you can complete 5 matchmade games without leaving, you will be returned to the normal queue. However, if you continue to leave games, you will remain in the low priority queue.
